note.p: Merchant and commercial clerk. In Valparaiso, Chile, c. 1850 to c. 1870. Son Henry William born in Valparaiso, 1857/8. In West Derby, Liverpool, 1871, 1881. Passenger clerk, Oceania Steamship Navigation Company, 1871; commercial clerk and ship broker, 1881.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/3844/141/29), 1881 (RG11/3701/72/29)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 25 September 2018)
England, births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 25 September 2018)
